bike.description: Demo 8 FSR frame, super low center of gravity and standover with sub-seatstay actuated shock, full cartridge bearing pivots, 26" F/R wheel, 8" of travel with full chainguide and front derailleur compatibility, ISCG mount, rear derailleur protector, 26 and 24" wheel compatible with two geometry settings, 16.7" chainstay length, forged and CNC'd OS HT, Super ORE TT/DT, Demo tool

components.description: Fox DHX 5.0 coil 8.75x2.75", adjustable rebound, ProPedal, bottom out control, IFP pressure
7050 hard annodized alloy collar with QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
